wishlist.title: Suns0lver Foundational Lathe #001
wishlist.purpose: A lathe is the 'machine that makes machines.' This is the first core fabrication anchor for BBAWC/BBAWM + early prototyping across SPANCL/MAM—shafts, bushings, spacers, fixtures, adapters, precision sleeves, tooling mods, repair parts, and small-run hardware.

features: 1" spindle bore (significant in this size class)
Infinitely variable spindle speed (50–2000 RPM) via DC brushless + belt drive
Power cross feed + carriage feed (production-capable, better finishes)
Quick-change spindle mount (fast, repeatable chuck swaps)

success_evidence: Delivery proof (photo of crate + bench placement)
First chips: video or photo set (facing + turning a simple spacer)
